scenario_name: Return to The Lair of Dagon
full_name: Scenario VII: Return to The Lair of Dagon

steps.text: Put the following locations into play: Grand Entryway, Foul Corridors, both copies of First Floor Hall, both copies of Second Floor Hall, and Third Floor Hall.

bullets.text: Each investigator begins play at the Grand Entryway.
Replace one of each Tidal Pool, Underground River and Underwater Cavern from original Flooded Caverns set with its counterpart from the Return to Flooded Caverns.
Set other locations aside, out of play.

steps.text: Set the following cards aside, out of play: Both copies of the Syzygy treachery, both copies of the Tidal Alignment treachery, the double-sided Yâ€™ha-nthlei Statue story asset, the Apostle of Dagon enemy, one copy of Stirring in His Sleep, and the double-sided Dagon enemy.
Replace the Second Oath act card with the new version from the Return set.
Shuffle the three versions of Doorway to the Depths together, remove two of them from the game at random without looking at them. Set the remaining one aside, out of play, without looking at it.
